about_the_game:
“Forsaken Island” is a gripping survival sim adventure set in a cursed and treacherous world. You play as Captain Elias Blackbone, a legendary pirate whose greed led to an eternal curse, leaving you as an undead skeletal husk. Awakening on the shores of a mysterious island after your ship's tragic demise, you must uncover the dark secrets of the cursed treasure that binds you.

With nothing but your wits and pirate ingenuity, you’ll scavenge, craft, and fight to survive. Explore vast and haunting biomes, from eerie jungles to sunken graveyards. Face off against supernatural foes and environmental hazards, rebuild your skeletal form with salvaged bones, and decide whether to break the curse or embrace your undead destiny.

Will you escape the island or become its ruler?

Key Features

  • Bonecrafting System: Rebuild and upgrade your skeletal body by scavenging bones and relics. Replace broken limbs for enhanced abilities like climbing, sprinting, or brute strength. Customize your undead form with rare artifacts.

  • Dynamic Exploration: Traverse four distinct zones—each teeming with secrets, environmental puzzles, and unique challenges. From the Shipwreck Coast to the Ashen Crater, uncover the island’s dark history while navigating treacherous terrain.

  • Supernatural Combat: Wield improvised weapons like bone-crafted swords and flintlock pistols. Fight off ghostly sailors, cursed beasts, and wraiths in dynamic and tactical combat.

  • Crafting and Survival: Use your pirate ingenuity to build tools, traps, shelters, and rafts. Scavenge resources from shipwrecks, ruins, and fallen foes to forge your path to freedom.

  • Evolving Narrative: Reclaim pieces of the cursed treasure to learn its dark origins. Your choices will shape your fate—will you restore your humanity, or claim dominion over the Forsaken Island?

Prepare for a dark and thrilling survival adventure where every bone you collect brings you closer to salvation—or doom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Awaken as Captain Elias Blackbone, a cursed pirate turned undead skeleton, stranded on a haunted island. Scavenge, craft, and fight to survive as you rebuild your body, uncover dark secrets, and decide your ultimate fate.
